abstract: Fifteen-year-old Queens youth is arrested on charges that he tried to rape two women as part of what authorities say is a pattern of five attacks in the borough's southeastern section; police say the suspect, whose name has not been released, was arrested and charged after being identified by victims in two lineups.
snippet: The youth, not identified by authorities, was identified in two lineups by women whose attempted rapes were said by police to be part of a pattern that began in September.
lead_paragraph: The youth, not identified by authorities, was identified in two lineups by women whose attempted rapes were said by police to be part of a pattern that began in September.

headline.main: 15-Year-Old Held in Rape Attempts in Queens
headline.print_headline: 15-Year-Old Held in Rape Attempts in Queens
headline.seo: 15-Year-Old Arrested on Rape Charges Related to Queens Attacks
